title: Game of Thrones
notes: Game throws a black screen and spikes the cpu. Never seems to actually start

title: Game of Thrones
notes: Can get it started by setting resolution and fullescreen=yes in config file.

title: Game of Thrones
notes: The game opens a Window in black and crashes a few seconds later

As Post before describes : You have to edit manually the Config file to your Resolution and set Fullscreen to true. You will find the Config File in -> [YOUR GAME FOLDER]/AGOTGame/Config/DefaultEngine.ini . There are 3 Options you have to edit ResX (Which is the X-Axis of your Resolution), ResY(Which is the Y-Axis of your Resolution) and Fullscreen=true . Then you are good to go. But the Game is sometimes a bit laggy.
